Detailed Description

class for closed loop control
According to: F. Doerrscheid/W. Latzel, Grundlagen der Regelungstechnik, B.G. Teubner Stuttgart
Page 436-437, Regelalgorithmen mit der Trapezregel

double  _TD,
double  _Td 
) 
                              TD * s
  Transfer function: Gr(s) = ---------
                             1 + Td*s
  T = cycle time in seconds

Definition at line 144 of file rlcontroller.cpp.

00145 {
00146   rlThread::lock();
00147   type = D_T1;
00148   T  = _T;
00149   TD = _TD;
00150   Td = _Td;
00151   dt = (int) (1000.0 * T);
00152   d0 = TD / (Td + T/2.0);
00153   d1 = -TD / (Td + T/2.0);
00154   c1 = (Td-T/2.0)/(Td+T/2.0);
00155   rlThread::unlock();
00156 }

double  _Td 
) 
                                  1 + TvP*s
  Transfer function: Gr(s) = Kp * ---------
                                  1 + Td*s
  T = cycle time in seconds

Definition at line 172 of file rlcontroller.cpp.

00173 {
00174   rlThread::lock();
00175   type = PD_T1;
00176   T   = _T;
00177   Kp  = _Kp;
00178   TvP = _TvP;
00179   Td  = _Td;
00180   dt = (int) (1000.0 * T);
00181   d0 = Kp * (TvP+T/2.0) / (Td + T/2.0);
00182   d1 = -Kp * (TvP - T/2.0) / (Td + T/2.0);
00183   c1 = (Td - T/2.0)/(Td + T/2.0);
00184   rlThread::unlock();
00185 }

00159 {
00160   rlThread::lock();
00161   type = PI;
00162   T  = _T;

00164   Tn = _Tn;

void rlController::setPID_T1 ( double  _T,
double  _Kpp,
double  _TnP,
double  _TvP,
double  _Td 
) 
                                   1 + TnP*s   1 + TvP*s
  Transfer function: Gr(s) = Kpp * --------- * ---------
                                     TnP*s     1 + Td*s
  T = cycle time in seconds

Definition at line 187 of file rlcontroller.cpp.

00188 {
00189   rlThread::lock();
00190   type = PID_T1;
00191   T   = _T;
00192   Kpp = _Kpp;
00193   TnP = _TnP;
00194   TvP = _TvP;
00195   Td  = _Td;
00196   dt = (int) (1000.0 * T);
00197   d0 = Kpp * ((TnP+T/2.0) / TnP) * ((TvP+T/2.0))/(Td+T/2.0);
00198   d1 = -2.0*Kpp * (TnP*TvP - (T/2.0)*(T/2.0)) / (TnP*(Td+T/2.0));
00199   d2 = Kpp*((TnP-T/2.0)/TnP)*((TvP-T/2.0)/(Td+T/2.0));
00200   c1 = 2*Td/(Td+T/2.0);
00201   c2 = -(Td-T/2.0)/(Td+T/2.0);
00202   rlThread::unlock();
00203 }

double(* rlController::getMeasurement)()

Definition at line 128 of file rlcontroller.h.

double rlController::Kp 
  Don't set the controller parameters directly
  Use the set methods, because they will also set the coefficients
  Controller parameters are for reading only
